name: Hacker_Support
description:
A small prototype made for Prototype Studio under the instruction of Bennett Foddy at the NYU Game Center, for the prompt "saying hello."

This game requires headphones, a mic, and an internet connection to play. 

Be sure to give this app permission to access the microphone. If you are unable to say "hello" then please exit the app and check your permissions.

If you’re still unable to get past saying “hello,” and you’re curious about the rest of the prototype, please feel free to check out the gameplay video below.  Apologies for the weird audio mixing on the video; it was a real pain to grab, as I had to record gameplay audio with my mic, while avoiding it being picked up by the game’s speech-to-text input system, while also listening to the game audio for player cues.
